title: World-Wide
text:
Boeing told airlines to stop flying its wide-body 777 equipped with a type of engine that broke apart during a flight, and the FAA is ordering immediate inspections.

---

Nominee for attorney general Judge Merrick Garland will pledge to confront a rise in extremist violence and racial discrimination during his Senate confirmation hearing.

---

The State Department didn't name new firms as targets for sanctions related to Nord Stream 2 , allowing work on the pipeline to continue.

---

Covid-19 survivors who received a dose of a vaccine are generating immune responses that might make a second shot unnecessary.

Scientists say conditions are ripe for the rise of more new coronavirus variants that could complicate efforts to control Covid-19.

Israel lifted curbs on most commerce and public activity, requiring a pass to document vaccination status for some pursuits.
